variants.Description in input context: This variant has been observed in patients with Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease.

Material used.Description: The SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cell line was transfected with wild-type and mutant (PMP2 c.1697T>C) plasmids.

Readout description.Result Description: The mutant protein (PMP2 c.1697T>C) was expressed at 60% of the wild-type level.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for both wild-type and mutant samples.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type plasmid was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% of wild-type level.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% of wild-type level.
